summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LeadFlow Pro system. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has critical Select component issues affecting filter functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: SelectItem components have empty string values causing React runtime errors
ui_bugs.error_message: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string

integration_issues.issue: Filter panel fails to open due to Select component errors

passed_tests: Lead CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
API endpoint functionality (23/23 backend tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Select/SelectItem components that have empty string values. This is causing React runtime errors and breaking filter functionality. The error occurs in filter dropdowns where SelectItem components need proper value props. All backend functionality is working perfectly.
